alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 01 at 6:24PM CST until December 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Forecast flooding increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier For the Calcasieu River...including Salt Water Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Lafayette Surrey Street Gage... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 630 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River at Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of Heymann Park off of Highway 90 will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 PM CST Friday was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 8.8 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
